verses.text: \w Some|strong="H1697"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w later|strong="H1961"\w*, \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* baker \w offended|strong="H2398"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* master, \w the|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w was|strong="H6547"\w* \w angry|strong="H7107"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w officers|strong="H8269"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w and|strong="H6547"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* baker,

\w and|strong="H1004"\w* imprisoned \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w*, \w the|strong="H5414"\w* same \w prison|strong="H1004"\w* \w where|strong="H8033"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w was|strong="H1004"\w* confined.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w captain|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w guard|strong="H2876"\w* \w assigned|strong="H6485"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w became|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* \w personal|strong="H8334"\w* \w attendant|strong="H8334"\w*. \w After|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w custody|strong="H4929"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w some|strong="H3117"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*,

\w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w these|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H8147"\w*—\w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egyptian|strong="H4714"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* baker, \w who|strong="H4428"\w* \w were|strong="H4714"\w* \w being|strong="H1004"\w* \w held|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*—\w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w on|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H1004"\w* same \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w each|strong="H2492"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* its own meaning.

\w When|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w came|strong="H3130"\w* \w to|strong="H7200"\w* \w them|strong="H7200"\w* \w in|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w he|strong="H1242"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w they|strong="H1242"\w* \w were|strong="H3130"\w* distraught.

\w So|strong="H7592"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w officials|strong="H5631"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w who|strong="H6547"\w* \w were|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w custody|strong="H4929"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* master’s \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w faces|strong="H6440"\w* \w so|strong="H7592"\w* downcast \w today|strong="H3117"\w*?”

“\w We|strong="H4994"\w* both \w had|strong="H2492"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*,” \w they|strong="H3808"\w* replied, “\w but|strong="H3808"\w* there \w is|strong="H3130"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w interpret|strong="H6622"\w* \w them|strong="H4994"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H3808"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* said \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w them|strong="H4994"\w*, “Don’t \w interpretations|strong="H6623"\w* belong \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w*? \w Tell|strong="H5608"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w dreams|strong="H2472"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*: “\w In|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H5608"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*,

\w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w on|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* \w vine|strong="H1612"\w* \w were|strong="H7969"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H8299"\w*. \w As|strong="H5927"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w budded|strong="H6524"\w*, \w its|strong="H5927"\w* \w blossoms|strong="H5322"\w* \w opened|strong="H5927"\w* \w and|strong="H5927"\w* \w its|strong="H5927"\w* clusters \w ripened|strong="H1310"\w* \w into|strong="H5927"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w grapes|strong="H6025"\w*, \w squeezed|strong="H7818"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* replied, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6623"\w*: \w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w branches|strong="H8299"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Within|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* position. \w You|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w just|strong="H4941"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w did|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H5414"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w goes|strong="H3318"\w* \w well|strong="H3190"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w please|strong="H4994"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w show|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* \w by|strong="H3318"\w* \w mentioning|strong="H2142"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* might \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w kidnapped|strong="H1589"\w* \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Hebrews|strong="H5680"\w*, \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w here|strong="H6311"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w which|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \w me|strong="H7760"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* dungeon.”

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* baker \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6622"\w* \w was|strong="H3130"\w* \w favorable|strong="H2896"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w too|strong="H5921"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dream|strong="H2472"\w*: \w There|strong="H2009"\w* \w were|strong="H8269"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w baskets|strong="H5536"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w white|strong="H2751"\w* \w bread|strong="H2751"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* \w were|strong="H7218"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* sorts \w of|strong="H7218"\w* baked \w goods|strong="H4639"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*, \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w were|strong="H7218"\w* eating \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w basket|strong="H5536"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.”

\w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6623"\w*: \w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w baskets|strong="H5536"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Within|strong="H5921"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* \w lift|strong="H5375"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w hang|strong="H8518"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*. \w Then|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w birds|strong="H5775"\w* \w will|strong="H1320"\w* eat \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w body|strong="H1320"\w*.”

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w which|strong="H8269"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w birthday|strong="H3205"\w*, \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w held|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w presence|strong="H8432"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* baker.

\w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* position, \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w that|strong="H5414"\w* \w he|strong="H5414"\w* \w once|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w placed|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cup|strong="H3563"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*’s \w hand|strong="H3709"\w*.

But Pharaoh \w hanged|strong="H8518"\w* \w the|strong="H8518"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* baker, just as \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w* \w had|strong="H3130"\w* described \w to|strong="H3130"\w* \w them|strong="H8518"\w* \w in|strong="H8269"\w* \w his|strong="H8269"\w* \w interpretation|strong="H6622"\w*.

\w The|strong="H2142"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w cupbearer|strong="H4945"\w*, however, \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* \w Joseph|strong="H3130"\w*; \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w forgot|strong="H7911"\w* \w all|strong="H7911"\w* \w about|strong="H3130"\w* \w him|strong="H2142"\w*.
